markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Malignant Sustenance](/Spells.aspx?ID=432)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 394 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=34)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing undead creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You embed a seed of negative energy in an undead creature, restoring its unnatural vigor. The target gains fast healing 7. This healing comes from negative energy, so it heals the undead rather than damaging it.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The fast healing increases by 2.
name: Malignant Sustenance

The target gains fast healing 7. This healing comes from negative energy, so it heals the undead rather than damaging it. --- Heightened (+1) The fast healing increases by 2.
